Name: Bluegrass
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered cucumber roll.
MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Review: Cucumber and bourbon with a hint of bittersweet orange.
History: Created in 2008 by Hayden Lambert at the Merchant Hotel in Belfast, Northern Ireland and named after the bluegrass that grows in Bourbon County, where some of the best horses in the world are bred.
